description: An item on an order. The details of the order item are specified in the productSpecOrderDetails.
title: orderItem

___action.description: The action to be taken for this order item (E.g. Install, Change).

$eref.description: An orderable representation of an Access Eline Product.
$eref.title: accessElineProductOrder

___uniReference.description: A reference to an existing or ordered UNI.

___sellerOvcId.description: The circuit identifier that the Seller uses to refer to this OVC.

___uniSiteContact.description: The primary site contact for the UNI site. The UNI site contacts are ONLY required when the UNI is NOT on the same Order as the Access Eline.

___uniIngressBandwidthProfile.description: The ingress bandwidth profile at the UNI end of the OVC that implements the Access Eline.

___enniSvlanId.description: The S-VLAN ID to be used for this service.

___enniIngressBandwidthProfile.description: The ingress bandwidth profile at the ENNI end of the OVC that implements the Access Eline.

___buyerOvcId.description: The circuit identifier that the Partner/Access Provider (Buyer) uses to refer to this OVC.

___colorForwardingEnabled.description: Color Forwarding is an OVC attribute defining the relationship between the color on an egress ENNI frame and the color of the corresponding ingress ENNI Frame or Service Frame.  For ordering, this attribute identifies if the Buyer requests Color Forwarding for this service

___productSpecification.description: A reference to the Partner/Access Provider (Seller) Product Specification (product catalog item) that the buyer is ordering.

___enniSiteContact.description: The primary site contact for the ENNI site.

___classOfServiceName.description: The name of the service level for this Access Eline. (E.g. Gold).

___uniSiteAlternateContact.description: The secondary site contact for the UNI site. The UNI site contacts are ONLY required when the UNI is NOT on the same Order as the Access Eline.

___enniSiteAlternateContact.description: The secondary site contact for the ENNI site.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, Eline.

___enniReference.description: A reference to an existing or ordered ENNI.

___ovcMaximumFrameSize.description: The maximum frame size provides the upper bounds on the length of an ingress frame . An integer greater or equal to 1526.

$eref.description: An orderable representation of a UNI Product.
$eref.title: uniProductOrder

___physicalLayer.description: The layer (layer 1) that provides transparent transmission of a bit stream over a circuit built from some physical communications medium.

___sellerUniId.description: The circuit identifier that the seller uses to refer to this UNI.

___uniResiliency.description: Indicates UNI resiliency and corresponding value.

___allToOneBundlingEnabled.description: All-to-One Bundling can be either Enabled or Disabled.  A value of True would equate to 'Enabled'.

___elmiEnabled.description: Indicates the desire for management of the customer interface. For ordering, this is an optional parameter that may be requested.

___buyerUniId.description: The circuit identifier that the buyer uses to refer to this UNI.

___numberOfLinks.description: The number of links supporting the UNI.

___synchronousModeEnabled.description: Identifies if the synchronous transmissions are to proceed at a constant rate.

___linkOamEnabled.description: Link OAM enables the operator to monitor and troubleshoot a single Ethernet link. For ordering, this is an optional parameter that may be requested.

___tokenShareEnabled.description: Identifies whether a given UNI is capable of sharing tokens across Bandwidth Profile Flows in an Envelope. MEF valid values are Enabled or Disabled.

___productSpecification.description: A reference to the Partner/Access Provider (Seller) Product Specification (product catalog item) that the buyer is ordering.

___uniMegEnabled.description: Request for monitoring of a UNI. For ordering, this is an optional parameter that may be requested.

___uniL2cpPeerings.description: An array of Layer 2 Control Protocols to peer at the UNI.

___uniL2cpAddressSet.description: Identifies the discard/pass action for all non-peered layer two control protocols. Enumeration: 'CTA', 'CTB' or 'CTB-2'.

___alternateSiteContact.description: The secondary site contact for the site.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, uniProduct for an Order.

___serviceSiteInformation.description: The service site for the UNI.

___primarySiteContact.description: The primary site contact for the site.

___uniMaximumServiceFrameSize.description: Indicates the maximum service frame size that can be reliably processed at the UNI level. An integer greater or equal to 1522.

$eref.description: A request by an organization (buyer) to  another ogranization (seller) to disconnect an existing order.
$eref.title: disconnectOrderItemDetail

___sellerNetworkIdentifier.description: One of the following Seller-assigned values may be included: OVC Identifier, EVC Identifier, UNI Identifier, ENNI Identifier.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, disconnectOrderItem.

___buyerNetworkIdentifier.description: One of the following Buyer-assigned values may be included: Buyer OVC Identifier, Buyer EVC Identifier, Buyer UNI Identifier, Buyer ENNI Identifier.

___orderItemDetail.description: The ordering representation of the product specification being ordered with this order item.

___orderItemReference.description: A reference number that can be used to refer to this order item.

___quantity.description: The quantity for the order item.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, orderItem.
